# npgo.to - Free URL Shortener for Nepal by Noble Stack

> Nepal's #1 free URL shortener and QR code generator. Created by Noble Stack for Nepali businesses, marketers, and creators.

## About npgo.to

npgo.to is a completely free URL shortening service designed specifically for Nepal. It allows users to:

- Shorten long URLs into memorable npgo.to links
- Generate QR codes for every shortened URL automatically  
- Manage all links through a powerful admin dashboard
- Sign in securely with Google authentication

## Key Features

- **Free URL Shortener**: Transform any long URL into a short, shareable npgo.to link
- **Free QR Code Generator**: Every shortened URL automatically gets a downloadable QR code
- **Free Link Management**: Dashboard to track, manage, and organize all your shortened URLs
- **Google Sign-In**: Secure authentication to keep your links organized
- **No Signup Required**: Start shortening URLs immediately without creating an account
- **Unlimited Links**: Create as many short links as you need, completely free
- **Permanent Links**: Your shortened URLs never expire

## Who Is This For?

- Nepali businesses needing short links for marketing
- Social media marketers in Nepal
- Content creators sharing links on social platforms
- Email marketers needing trackable short links
- Anyone needing QR codes for print materials like business cards, flyers, posters

## About Noble Stack

Noble Stack is a technology company based in Nepal that builds digital products and services for the Nepali market. npgo.to is one of our flagship products.

Website: https://www.noblestack.io

## Contact

- Website: https://npgo.to
- Parent Company: https://www.noblestack.io

- Nepal URL Shortener
- Free QR Code Generator Nepal
- Nepali Link Shortener
- Noble Stack URL Shortener

- Bit.ly Alternative for Nepal
- TinyURL Alternative for Nepal
